scripts.prep: copyfiles analytics.js dist && concat node_modules/material-design-lite/material.min.js node_modules/seedrandom/seedrandom.min.js > dist/lib.js && concat img/progress_spin.svg -o dist/progress_spin.svg && concat node_modules/cornerstone-wado-image-loader/dist/cornerstoneWADOImageLoaderWebWorker.js -o dist/cornerstoneWADOImageLoaderWebWorker.js && concat node_modules/cornerstone-wado-image-loader/dist/cornerstoneWADOImageLoaderCodecs.js -o dist/cornerstoneWADOImageLoaderCodecs.js
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-html
scripts.watch: npm run prep && concurrently "npm run watch-js" "npm run watch-css" "npm run watch-html"
